XmlPlayerInterface Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for XmlPlayerInterface:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class used with xml playerlist

The php files that works on PlayerList (account) should use this interface. It works with the Players and their notes.

XmlPlayerInterface::XmlPlayerInterface (  ) 

Creates a XmlPlayerInterface object

XmlPlayerInterface::getAllPlayers (  ) 

Return an array of player xml nodes

XmlPlayerInterface::getPlayerByName ( $  name  ) 

Get a player by its name

You can test the existance of this player with if ($player)

Parameters:
$name The value of the name tag
Returns:
The player xml node or NULL if the player does not exist.

XmlPlayerInterface::getPlayerName ( $  player  ) 

Get the name of a player xml node

The good way to use this function is to get the player xml node first (by a call to getPlayerByName) and call this with the returned player.

Parameters:
$player The player XML node
Returns:
The player name or "" if the given player does not exist

XmlPlayerInterface::getPlayerBlackList ( $  player  ) 

Get the blacklist status of a player xml node

Parameters:
$player The player XML node
Returns:
The player blacklist status or "" if the given player does not exist

XmlPlayerInterface::getPlayerPassword ( $  player  ) 

Get the password of a player xml node

Returns:

XmlPlayerInterface::addPlayer ( $  name,
$  mail,
$  pwd,
$  timestamp 
)

Add a player and save the document

The Blacklist is set to 'No'.

Parameters:
$name The name of the new player
$mail The mail of the new player
$pwd The passwotd hashsum of the new player
$timestamp The creation timestamp of the new player

XmlPlayerInterface::isPlayerExists ( $  name  ) 

Test if the player's name already exists

Parameters:
$name The name of the player to test
Returns:
true if the player already exists, false if it does not exist

XmlPlayerInterface::isMailExists ( $  mail  ) 

Test if the player's email adress already in use

Parameters:
$mail The mail address to test
Returns:
true if the email adress already in use, false if it does not
